price: Kuma Allah ne Ya halicce ku, sa'an nan Yanã karɓar rãyukanku, kuma daga gare ku akwai wanda ake mayarwã zuwa ga mafi ƙasƙncin rãyuwa, dõmin kada ya san kõme a bãyan dã ya zama mai ilmi. Lalle Allah ne Masani Mai ĩkon yi.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمۡ ثُمَّ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُمۡۚ وَمِنكُم مَّن يُرَدُّ إِلَىٰٓ أَرۡذَلِ ٱلۡعُمُرِ لِكَيۡ لَا يَعۡلَمَ بَعۡدَ عِلۡمٖ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٞ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu khalaqakum thumma yatawaffākum waminkum man yuraddu ilā ardhali al-ʿumuri likay lā yaʿlama baʿda ʿil'min shayan inna al-laha ʿalīmun qadīrun
